articles.author: SAM MEDNICK
articles.title: Niger's coup leaders say they will prosecute deposed President Mohamed Bazoum for 'high treason' - The Associated Press
articles.description: Niger’s mutinous soldiers say they will prosecute deposed President Mohamed Bazoum for “high treason” and undermining state security. The announcement came hours after the junta said they were open to dialogue with West African nations to resolve the crisis. …
articles.content: NIAMEY, Niger (AP) Nigers mutinous soldiers say they will prosecute deposed President Mohamed Bazoum for high treason and undermining state security, in an announcement hours after the junta said the… [+5901 chars]

articles.title: Niger's Military Junta To Prosecute Ex President For "High Treason" - NDTV
articles.description: Niger's military regime vowed late Sunday to prosecute ousted president Mohamed Bazoum for "high treason" and slammed West African leaders for imposing sanctions on the country.
articles.content:
Demonstrations in favour of the new military rulers have become a common sight in Niamey.
